/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
